publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2926# Pauline McNeill: Teenage Cancer Trust - Beatson Oncology Unit—That the Parliament pledges its support to the campaign to raise £750,000 for the first ever specialist teenage cancer ward to be set up in Scotland by the Teenage Cancer Trust at the Beatson Oncology Unit in Glasgow.
S1M-2926# Teenage Cancer Trust - Beatson Oncology Unit (lodged on 20 March 2002) Robin Harper*

S1M-2926# Pauline McNeill: Teenage Cancer Trust - Beatson Oncology Unit—That the Parliament pledges its support to the campaign to raise £750,000 for the first ever specialist teenage cancer ward to be set up in Scotland by the Teenage Cancer Trust at the Beatson Oncology Unit in Glasgow. Supported by: Robin Harper
S1M-2926# Teenage Cancer Trust - Beatson Oncology Unit (lodged on 20 March 2002) Mr Michael McMahon*, Donald Gorrie*, Bill Butler*, Marilyn Livingstone*
S1M-2926# Teenage Cancer Trust - Beatson Oncology Unit (lodged on 20 March 2002) Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-2926# Teenage Cancer Trust - Beatson Oncology Unit (lodged on 20 March 2002) Elaine Smith*, Scott Barrie*
S1M-2926# Teenage Cancer Trust - Beatson Oncology Unit (lodged on 20 March 2002) Cathie Craigie*, Jackie Baillie*
S1M-2926# Teenage Cancer Trust - Beatson Oncology Unit (lodged on 20 March 2002) Maureen Macmillan*
S1M-2926# Teenage Cancer Trust - Beatson Oncology Unit (lodged on 20 March 2002) Brian Fitzpatrick*
S1M-2926# Teenage Cancer Trust - Beatson Oncology Unit (lodged on 20 March 2002) Janis Hughes*
